Cos'è il CoderDojo?

CoderDojo Rimini è:
1. Coding
2. Scratch
3. Robotica con Arduino e Raspberry.
4. Web development con Jekyll.
5. Divertimento!

Leggi tutto ›

Scarica Scratch

Scratch is free and licensed under a MIT License. Scaricalo e comincia a sviluppare. Prendi la versione Off Line per il tuo sistema operativo o prova ad usare quella on line più aggiornata. Scrivici via Twitter @coderdojoRN.

Tienimi informato sui prossimi incontri ›

Photo by Corey Blaz

Video & Music Player

Play Audio & Video with media­element.js

Do you like music? Or are you a podcaster? Do you want to stream your videos in a nice player? Than you likely will like the integration of mediaelement.js. It enables you to play music and stream video in a consistent player that looks in each browser delicious. It even works in IE6-8. Leggi Ancora ›
